content: {"name": "Salvation Army", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Also helps with rent and utility assistance; clothing vouchers too", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "355 Alexander Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Henderson", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "27536", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 36.31542719999999, "longitude": -78.403649}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 522-4970", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
